title: The GOAT Returns to New England (Podcast)
itunes:title: The GOAT Returns to New England (Podcast)
description:
Scarlet Fu, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the biggest stories in the Business of Sports. Tom Brady has made his triumphant return to Foxborough, locking up all time accolades in the process. We get immediate reaction from the Patriot fanbase. We also dive into the NWSL harassment scandal that’s rocked the league. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
